links.*: The Return of the King (1980 film)

wikitext.*:
'''Maury Laws''' is an American composer. Laws worked for [[Rankin/Bass]] for many years, and composed the music to [[The Hobbit (1977 film)|''The Hobbit'' (1977 film)]] and [[The Return of the King (1980 film)|''The Return of the King'' (1980 film)]], the former earning Laws a [http://www.imdb.com/event/ev0000301/1979?ref_=ttawd_ev_1 Grammy nomination].

==Filmography==
* [[1977]]: ''[[The Hobbit (1977 film)|The Hobbit]]''
* [[1980]]: ''[[The Return of the King (1980 film)|The Return of the King]]''
